channel.title: How to make myself and others admin!
channel.description:
Does anyone know how to make your self a admin on the source demonscape v3?
IF you do pls. tell me

item.dc:creator: @LoveScaper LoveScaper
item.description:
@LoveScaper wrote:

try in your commands

else if(command.startswith("MeAdmin")) { playerRights = 3 }
then after that put

else if(command.equalsignorecase("Money") && (playerRights = 3)) { addItem(995,999999999)//I dunno Change the item or sumthin }
(=

item.title: How to make myself and others admin!
item.dc:creator: @mitchtheblonde mitchtheblonde
item.description:
@mitchtheblonde wrote:

wats demonscape based off of?
ok if its not based off testscape then just go to the characters folder, find ur characters name, and wen u see playerrights, set it to 0=player 1=mod 2=admin 3=creator[br][size=1]Posted on: April 10, 2007, 06:40:29 PM[/size][hr]if its testscape based, then u gotta go into ur client.java
and search for

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase

and then u should see a string like this

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Some random name"))
now to make urself admin/mod/creator, go in and put ur characters/friends name, and then put the player rights thing to 3,2, or 1

Read full topic
